snippet: The inaugural version of this festival, called PaleyFest: Made in NY, will run from Oct. 2 through 6 and include panels with actors and creators from shows like “Orange Is the New Black,” “Elementary,” “The Americans” and “Boardwalk...
abstract: The inaugural version of this festival, called PaleyFest: Made in NY, will run from Oct. 2 through 6 and include panels with actors and creators from shows like “Orange Is the New Black,” “Elementary,” “The Americans” and “Boardwalk Empire.”

headline.main: Paley Center's Television Festival Coming to New York
headline.print_headline: PaleyFest: Made in NY Coming in October
